message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 55/45 in my favor.
I think a 51/49 split in my favor is more fair. We both get a bit more than your initial offer, and it allows us to start negotiating towards a mutually agreeable outcome.
I'm willing to budge a bit, but 52/48 is my final offer. If we don't reach an agreement soon, the inflation will hurt us both significantly.
